def: A work; specif. (Mus.), a musical composition.
False or depraved sight; imaginary vision of objects. Forsyth.
One who does homage, or holds land of another by homage; avassal. Bacon.
A name for several species of mushroom, of which one(Cantharellus cibrius) is edible, the others reputed poisonous.
Having down upon the pterylæ only; -- said of the young ofcertain birds.

An old name for a fossil consisting of the petrified teeth andpalatal bones of fishes belonging to the family of Pycnodonts (thickteeth), whose remains occur in the oölite and chalk formations;toadstone; -- so named from a notion that it was originally formed inthe head of a toad.
